title: PHP JavaScript Quoted String
description: Reflects the q parameter from PHP into a quoted JavaScript assignment.
php:
PHP to JavaScript Quoted String

The q parameter lands inside a single-quoted JavaScript variable.

Param: ?q=

Close the quote and escape the statement to execute arbitrary JavaScript.
objectives: Terminate the single-quoted string that wraps q.
Escape the assignment with a semicolon and inject your own JavaScript (e.g., alert(1)).
Keep the script syntactically valid after your injection.
hints: The context is: var message = '[INPUT]'; built by PHP.
Break the string, add your payload, then comment out the remainder.
